subject: Technology
title: Web3 and the Decentralized Dream
description: One-minute skill: Web3 and the Decentralized Dream.

hook.text: Web 1.0 was read-only. Web 2.0 let you post and share. Web3 promises you'll own your data.

buildup.text: Today, platforms like Google and Facebook store your data on their servers and profit from it.

discovery.text: Web3 uses blockchain to let users control their own identity and assets without middlemen.

twist.text: Critics say Web3 is mostly hype, speculation, and rebranded cryptocurrency marketing.

climax.text: Whether it succeeds or fails, Web3 reveals real frustration: people want digital ownership.

punchline.text: Web3 asks a real question. The answer is still loading.

quiz.question: What does Web3 promise users?
options: Ownership and control of their own data
